Lead Time Update for RCV Valves | March 13, 2014
Confidential & Proprietary
Research Control® Valves Return toStandard Lead Times
As of today, the Research Control® Valves product line is returning to normal delivery standards. We apologize for any burdens you may have experienced during the brief period of extended lead times.
If you have any questions, please contact your sales representative or customer service.
Sincerely, Brian Kettner Marketing Manager RCV-Research Control Valves and Preso
